data.name: TextSortDescriptor
desc: describes sort criteria for sorting text.

properties.name: Delimiter
desc: contains the character that marks the separation of columns.

properties.name: IsSortAscending0
desc: determines if the sorting in the first search key is done in ascending or descending order.

properties.name: IsSortAscending1
desc: determines if the sorting in the second search key is done in ascending or descending order.

properties.name: IsSortAscending2
desc: determines if the sorting in the third search key is done in ascending or descending order.

properties.name: IsSortInTable
desc: determines if the content of a table is to be sorted.

properties.name: IsSortNumeric0
desc: determines if the sorting in the first search key is done numeric or alphanumeric order.

properties.name: IsSortNumeric1
desc: determines if the sorting in the second search key is done in numeric or alphanumeric order.

properties.name: IsSortNumeric2
desc: determines if the sorting in the third search key is done in numeric or alphanumeric order.

properties.name: SortRowOrColumnNo0
desc: contains the row or column index used in the first search key.

properties.name: SortRowOrColumnNo1
desc: contains the row or column index used in the second search key.

properties.name: SortRowOrColumnNo2
desc: contains the row or column index used in the third search key.
